/* Find the key dates */
Title1 "Key Dates";
DATA Date;
	First2004 = mdy(1,1,2004);
	Last2004 = mdy(12,31,2004);
	Last2005 = mdy(12,31,2005);
RUN;
PROC PRINT Data = Date Label Noobs;
	Label
		First2004 = "First Day of 2004"
		Last2004 = "Last Day of 2004"
		Last2005 = "Last Day of 2005";
RUN;
/* PROC SQL */
Title1 "Question 1";
PROC SQL;
	Select Employee_ID, Order_Date
		From ST60HW3.order_fact
		Where Order_Date <= 16801 And Employee_ID In
			(Select Employee_ID
				From ST60HW3.sales
				Where Hire_Date >= 16071 And Hire_Date <= 16436 And Job_Title In ("Sales Rep. III","Sales Rep. IV"));
QUIT;
